statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, activity_type, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type != 'Logout' AND user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 456 AND activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM audit_logs WHERE action_taken = 'login';
SELECT account_number, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, access_time, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_number, balance FROM audit_logs JOIN user_accounts ON audit_logs.user_id = user_accounts.user_id WHERE action_taken = 'login' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance, MAX(balance) AS max_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, MAX(access_time) AS latest_access FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 5 ORDER BY latest_access DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs JOIN user_sessions ON audit_logs.user_id = user_sessions.user_id ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, full_name FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT action, COUNT(log_id) FROM audit_logs GROUP BY action HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT u.username, s.login_time FROM user_accounts u INNER JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_audit_logs ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, activity, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) = 12;
SELECT * FROM user_audit_log;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM user_audit_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT account_id, action, timestamp FROM account_audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_type FROM account_activity_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_log WHERE description LIKE '%compliance%';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, user_id FROM user_audit_log WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT account_id, action, timestamp FROM account_audit_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_log WHERE user_id = 456 AND login_time >= '2022-01-01' AND logout_time < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, account_id, timestamp FROM account_activity_log WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
